Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. This product has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I'm extending this opportunity to you with an exclusive offer of $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing exceptional products to our valued customers. Would you like to make this investment in enhancing your lifestyle? 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
